summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the construction of a steel pipeline from a connection with the Controlling Works at Lake Youngs to a connection with the Distributing System in the vicinity of 51st Avenue South and Leo Street; and of a steel pipeline from a connection with the City's main supply pipeline in the vicinity of 51st Avenue South and Leo Street to 4th Avenue Southwest and West Henderson Street, out of funds provided for in, and designating the same as two of the additions and betterments to and extensions of the municipal water works system contemplated by Ordinance No. 58624, authorizing expenditures and appropriating funds therefor.
